title: The Perfect 2x2 renovated apt that You Need to Call HOME~
posting_body: ['Heatherstone: Apartments in Mountain View', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'x202', 'From $3,488', '.', '2 Bed 2 Bath .', '950 Sq.Ft', '* Unit 701 - Available 08/31/22', 'Heatherstone Apartments', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '877 Heatherstone Way Mountain View, CA 94040', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Hands down, the garden setting of Heatherstone Apartments is unbeatable.', 'Delicate meandering paths lead you through the grounds from one home to the next.', 'Heatherstone Apartments is an ideal location to relax, rejuvenate, and reinvent your life.', 'Take a dip in the pool or work up a sweat in the fitness center.', 'This place has a beautiful swimming pool, a clubhouse lounge with an excellent kitchen and a spectacular fireplace to treat your friends and family to on the weekends.', 'Heatherstone Apartments would love to have you as a resident.', 'LEASE\u2002\u2002TERMS', 'Variable', 'OFFICE\u2002 \u2002HOURS', 'Monday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', '9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', '9:00am to 5:00pm', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x202', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
